item.title: Help with runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

case 2478: if(actionTimer == 0) { if(playerHasItemAmount(1436, 1)==false) { sendMessage("you do not have enough essence to craft air runes."); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(1436, 1)==true) { stillgfx(186, absY, absX); setAnimation(791); sendMessage("You get some Runes!"); actionTimer = 0; deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); addItem(561, 1); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[20]), 20); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

how would i get that to delete multiple rune ess from the pack? because atm its using 1 ess at a time and giving 1 rune at a time.

Read full topic
